website_summaries.verdict: Shampoo that strengthens hair and provides extra volume.
pros: Uses blend to reduce hair loss by 46% in just 1 month
UV absorbents to protect hair from UV rays
Menthol for fresh smell and tingly sensation
cons: Menthol ingredient burns if it gets into eyes

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of best choice award. Smells wonderful, makes hair thicker. What I didn't like was the fact that I do believe it was a return that was sent back out. There was no safety seal, had shampoo residue on the outside and was not completely full. I didn't return because of time restrictions for travel. Disappointing, but I really like the actual product.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Reed Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Use with the Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and the companion conditioner is perfect if you want your hair to be shiny and have full body. I am a long time user, and after my hair salon stopped being a Bumble and Bumble salon, I was thrilled to find that I can buy it from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Mc

customer_reviews.title: Smelled really bad-- tainted product!!
customer_reviews.text: I generally love this product but the bottle from this supplier quickly smelled very bad and I could not use it. Their product must be incredibly old or a different formula. Do not spend your money on tainted product!!
customer_reviews.author: MsBryant

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my hair feeling dirty...
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my hair feeling like it needs to be washed again. There’s an odd heavy, greasy feeling to it, especially on the top. I like the smell, but wouldn’t purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Did more harm than good
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a week and it dried my hair out! It does not lather well, and the price is just too steep for such a little bottle. It also made my hair fall out more than before!
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo - i think i have finally found the best shampoo for me.
customer_reviews.author: Blairsie

customer_reviews.title: i had read that after a week of using the product i could review it and recieve an additional free
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine. It is very expensive, but i figured i could recieve two for the price of one therefore i tried it. I have not recieved my free one. I would like it or I will have to return this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My B&B review
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine for me... it is true to its slogan, the only negative point is the price and availability. Its not available in UAE and i have to order it online from US in $$
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My damaged hair is so much better since using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Panda Heart Publishing

customer_reviews.title: Bottle not full
customer_reviews.text: I love this product but the bottle I received was only 3/4 full. Which is disappointing, considering the price
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Inger

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality to say the lest!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! Product cane in with no seal, which is quite alarming in and of itself, and it was leaking all over the plastic big that it was wrapped in. I’ve bought many salon-quality products in the past and they’ve always been protected with an inside seal. The fact that this product contains no seal makes me question it’s authenticity as a true Bumble and Bumble product and the professionalism of the seller. Poor quality to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: I have salon color treated hair that is cut short and very fine. I have noticed my hair thinning a lot! I would only wash my hair twice a week. I began using this shampoo a month ago on a daily basis and I have really noticed a new fullness in my hair and no hair on the shower floor! You really need to use a good conditioner after shampooing. I bought the B & B full potential conditioner on another website and I use that on a daily basis also.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Best feature? Fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it lives up to the 'full hair potential claim' (as it says on the bottle) but it smells great.
customer_reviews.author: bls

customer_reviews.title: Delivers what it promises to do. Strongly urge you to use the Full Potential Conditioner.
customer_reviews.text: Just like it's conditioner this shampoo does make your hair fuller and stronger. Will keep on purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting delivery!
customer_reviews.text: The bottles came in plastic bags with half the content spilled in the bags. Absolutely disgusting and unacceptable. And this is no cheap shampoo. Definitely asking my money back. 😡
customer_reviews.author: REMY VAN DER PUT

customer_reviews.title: Smell is unbearable .
customer_reviews.text: Whatever advantages this may have for thinning hair, the unbearable smell of it overrides the the benefits. The smell of a cheap men's cologne follows one 24 hours a day. I will not buy it again. Surely, there are better products out there for thinning hair. MDE
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Darlene Ehinger

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair and this did no better than the cheap shampoo. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Velsor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love what this does for my hair! It's helped with breakage and just my making my hair look healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: smells wonderful, and leaves hair super shiny
customer_reviews.text: Light weight or my in hair, smells wonderful, and leaves hair super shiny.
customer_reviews.author: KellyGirl68

customer_reviews.title: This is a gentle, volumizing shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I like its scent, my hair just looks better since using it, and is more full
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shampoo and makes my hair look and feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its shampoo, I dont think think its worth the ...
customer_reviews.text: its shampoo, I dont think think its worth the extra money in comparison to the other B and B shampoos. It leaves your hair kind of slick plastic feeling,
customer_reviews.author: R. R. Alligood

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by my hair dresser because I am losing a ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my hair dresser because I am losing a lot of hair but it did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ana S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AWESOME!! I have very thin, fine hair, and I FINALLY look like I have somewhat thick hair! I have tried all the "thickening" shampoos and conditioners, and they just seem to dry out my hair and make it frizzy. This shampoo makes my hair fuller, and also makes it so soft! And I love the smell! It smells like Bath and Body Works scent they used to have called Black Chamomile. It's expensive, but to me, it's worth the money, cause I only have to use a little bit, and I don't have to use any other products.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Finally something worked!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Ever since I started using this product along with the conditioner my hair isn't super dry, and I have far less breakage. It's a little pricey however a little goes along way.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: BEST FOR HAIR LOSS
customer_reviews.text: First of all this shampoo is meant to be used for those who have loss of hair & it is treated. I believe it has tee tree or menthol because the shampoo feels cool on the scalp & cold on your face. I absolutely love this! I've used it for about two weeks now & my hair is fuller, thicker & my hair loss has gone down significantly! I don't believe its meant for everyone but if you're having hair loss this shampoo HELPS ALOT!!
customer_reviews.author: Estrella S.

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: I'm losing less hair because of this product but the smell is terrible. It's a strong perfume smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

product_meta.title: Bumble and Bumble Full Potential Hair Preserving Shampoo for Unisex Shampoo, 8.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: An invigorating shampoo that exfoliates the scalp, creating an optimal environment to restore damaged hair. This shampoo combats against the visible signs of hair loss due to breakage.
feature_bullets: An invigorating shampoo that exfoliates the scalp
This shampoo combats against the visible signs of hair loss due to breakage
It creates an optimal environment to restore damaged hair
The packlage dimension of the product is: 2"L x2"W x5.8"H
